AD.name: Max Connections per Host
AD.description: Defines the maximum number of connections allowed per host configuration.

AD.name: Socket Timeout
AD.description: Defines the socket timeout in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data.

AD.name: Connection Timeout
AD.description: Determines the timeout in milliseconds until a connection is etablished.

AD.name: Use Content Encoding
AD.description: Specifies whether the crawler should use ContentEncoding.

AD.name: Maximum size of documents to download
AD.description: Defines the size limit for documents to fetch in kile-bytes. A value of -1 allows every file-size. Only in effect if supported by the server.
